meanings.definition: To polish or clean (an object) by rubbing or brushing.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys furbishing her jewelry to make it shine.
meanings.sent2: The maid spent the afternoon furbishing the silverware.
meanings.sent3: After furbishing the old vase, it looked as good as new.
meanings.sent4: The artist furbished the painting until it gleamed like a diamond.
meanings.sent5: With great care, he furbished the antique mirror to perfection.

meanings.definition: The act of renovating or improving the appearance of something.
meanings.sent1: The furbishing of the living room made it look brand new.
meanings.sent2: He hired a team to handle the furbishing of the old mansion.
meanings.sent3: The furbishing of the garden turned it into a beautiful oasis.
meanings.sent4: The furbishing of the store attracted more customers.
meanings.sent5: The furbishing of the hotel lobby created a welcoming atmosphere.
